laspy
=====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which laspy installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using laspy, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load laspy/2.6.1-foss-2025a
```
